comments.raw_text:
My friend tends to have a ton of windows and tabs open, and multiple times now he's got into a crash on startup cycle because he runs out of RAM on session restore. It would be useful for him to be able to get an idea of how many tabs and windows are open, and I think this would be a more generally useful thing to show in about:support - something simple like:

Total tab count: xxx
Total window count: yyy

Ideally these numbers would update every time focus switched to a tab with about:support loaded in it so it isn't showing stale numbers.
